participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and dedicated, Emily finds joy in teaching and helping others.
participant_1.background: I don't have time for Comic Con, but I do have time to volunteer at my local animal shelter. I used to enjoy playing sports, but my back pain has made it too difficult. In my spare time I like to play video games. I earn passive income that no one knows about. I love eating at the local sports bar with my son after his games.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and ambitious, Jordan balances her time between tutoring and her passion for business.
participant_2.background: I read my favorite comic books to take my mind off of things. I enjoy getting my nails done as a way to relax and pamper myself. I drive a car that is both reliable and fuel-efficient, so I can get to my business and music lessons on time. I work as an online tutor during the hours that I am awake. My parents are still married.

content.text: It's going great, thanks for asking!  How about yours?
It's going well so far! Just getting ready to go to work.
Oh nice! What do you do for work?
I'm a teacher at the local elementary school.
That's so cool! I used to want to be a teacher when I was younger, but I decided to go into business instead.
That's awesome! I love being a teacher, but I can see how business would be really rewarding too.
Yeah, it is! I get to work from home and set my own hours, which is really nice.
That's awesome! I wish I could work from home!
It is definitely nice, but it can also be lonely sometimes.
I can imagine! Do you have any hobbies to keep yourself busy?
Yes, I love to read comic books and get my nails done.
I love comic books too! I used to read them all the time when I was younger.
Me too! I still read them every now and then, but not as much as I used to.
Yeah, I know what you mean. I still have a ton of comic books that I need to read.
I'm the same way! I have a whole bookshelf full of them.
We should start a comic book club!
